author: Reuters Editorial
title: China banking sector total assets +8.0 pct y/y to 248.34 trln yuan at end-feb- regulator
text:
March 26 (Reuters) - The value of assets held by Chinaâ€™s banking sector rose 8.0 percent year-on-year to 248.34 trillion yuan ($39.34 trillion) as of end-February, China Banking Regulatory Commission said on Monday.
Liabilities rose 7.7 percent from a year earlier to 228.65 trillion yuan, it said on its website.
$1 = 6.3120 Chinese yuan renminbi Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom Editing by Shri Navaratnam
